  • License Key
  • OpenAI API Key (if configured)
  • Google Gemini API Key (if configured)

item.title: v1.1.37
item.description:
Version v1.1.37

  • Improved memory efficiency across the application
    • * Reduced thumbnail resolution from 512px to 256px for better memory usage while maintaining quality * Optimized high-resolution image caching with moderate limits (150MB for full images, 60MB for thumbnails) * Eliminated redundant intermediate-quality image creation during loading * Added memory pressure monitoring to automatically clear caches when needed
  • Fixed image selection sync issue where selecting an image sometimes displayed a different image in the preview pane
  • Enhanced image loading process to better handle selection changes
  • Added proper ID tracking and verification throughout the image loading process
  • Improved synchronization between thumbnail list and detail view
  • Optimized image scaling algorithms to preserve quality while reducing memory footprint
  • Enhanced caching strategy with prioritized loading of frequently accessed images
  • Added verification of image IDs before loading to prevent incorrect image display
  • Implemented graceful timeout handling for slow-loading images

item.title: v1.1.36
item.description:
Version v1.1.36

  • Updated OpenAI integration to use the new /v1/chat/completions response endpoint.
  • This change enables PDF processing through the updated endpoint as well.
